bibl.title: Egyptians and Greeks.
bibl.note: An Inaugural Lecture delivered before the University of Oxford on 25 November 1966. Originally privately printed in 1973.
bibl.seg: Barns J.W.B., Egyptians and Greeks. (Papyrologica Bruxellensia. 14.)
Bruxelles, Fondation Égyptologique Reine Élisabeth, 1978, 8°, 24 pp.
An Inaugural Lecture delivered before the University of Oxford on 25 November 1966. Originally privately printed in 1973.
C.R. par G. Husson, REG 93 (1980) p. 579. - J. Schwartz, AntCl 49 (1980) p. 499.
